title: Australian Stories Through Art
content:
Hello, I'm Robin Custance, an Aboriginal Australian artist, part-time Kangaroo whisperer, and a lifelong storyteller through color, line, and imagination. My journey began on Kaurna Country in Adelaide, with roots extending to the Naracoorte region (Boandik Country).

Each piece I create—be it dot painting, digital design, or contemporary Australian landscape—reflects a profound respect for Country, community, and the vibrant stories passed down through generations.

Regardless of style or subject, my goal as an artist is to tell stories and convey genuine emotion. Whether working with ancient dot techniques, digital tools, or bold, modern colors, I infuse heart and meaning into every piece.

My art is a tribute to keeping culture alive, merging the timeless with the contemporary, and weaving my heritage into today's creative spirit. When you invite my art into your home, you welcome a piece of Australian story and soul, crafted with passion and character.
